Text: Sorry correction on question Cc LLoyd Will and Kim Melodick have requested your help in identifying what YOU feel it takes to be successful within each functional unit of East Power This feedback will be used to create a recruiting retention and development tool that will assist East Power in identifying the skills and training that are key to your groups success Please take some time to answer the attached four questions as they relate to your area Your participation and cooperation is greatly appreciated Sarah Zarkowsky x Ben Brasseaux x Meliza Evanson x Enron North America Human Resources

RE Sick Leave ProcedureThanks Michelle I will incorporate those changes and check with Lizzette I think Rick was just the messenger I got the impression the group wanted procedures that were somewhat vague not so many requirements Sarah Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Tue AM To Zarkowsky Sarah Cc Subject RE Sick Leave Procedure Sarah this does not strike me as too bureaucratic Exactly what were Ricks concerns Perhaps you could make it more of a step by step process instead of a paragraph One other thing we should have some sort of excuse for not calling if unable to due to impairment Also if a person contacts a supervisor about a lengthy medical leave that is supported by a doctors note he should not have to call in every day You might want to check with Lizzette for some suggested language on this as I believe she had some ideas Thanks Michelle Original Message From Zarkowsky Sarah Sent Mon PM To Cash Michelle Cc Subject Sick Leave Procedure SICK LEAVE POLICY Policy To keep the business and each department running smoothly and efficiently it is important that every employee be on the job on time regularly For this reason careful attention is given to promptness absence record and overall dependability Enron recognizes however that an employee may occasionally be unable to come to work due to injury or illness As a result the Sick Leave policy is designed to provide protection to employees against loss of income during pregnancy illness or injury Eligible employees who are unable to perform their jobs due to pregnancy illness or injury are eligible to receive sick leave pay for up to hours months in a twelve month period assuming certain procedures are followed Effective January the Family Medical Leave Act FMLA runs concurrently with Enrons Sick Leave policy An employee who is still disabled after using the hours of sick leave pay ends may qualify for long term disability insurance Sick days cannot be carried over from one calendar year to the next and employees are not paid for sick days either at the end of the calendar year or upon termination Proposed Policy Link Procedures To be eligible for sick leave pay employees unable to report to work must telephone their supervisor directly each day of their absence as far in advance as possible If their supervisor is not available the employees human resources representative should be contacted If an employee is unable to make the call personally a family member or a friend should contact the supervisor The supervisor or human resources representative must be contacted each day of absence An employee who fails to contact hisher immediate supervisor or human resources representative may forfeit the sick leave pay and may be considered as having voluntarily resigned This policy must be followed unless an exception has been made for a particular absence and a written memo to this effect has been sent to the employees human resources representative On the fifth day of continued absence due to injury or illness in addition to notifying the employees supervisor or human resources representative the employee must also attain a doctors certification indicating the estimated date in which the employee will be able to return to work Any absences exceeding weeks will require a doctors certification indicating that the employee is able to return to work

Vacation pay back HR tierIn developing the HR tier for the vacation policy I would like to mention the fact that employees willmay have to pay back vacation used before accrued What can I say They may or will have to pay it back Any differences between voluntary and involuntary terminations Thanks Sarah

As a result the Sick Leave policy is designed to provide protection to employees against loss of income during pregnancy illness or injury Eligible employees who are unable to perform their jobs due to pregnancy illness or injury are eligible to receive sick leave pay for up to hours months in a twelve month period assuming certain procedures are followed Effective January the Family Medical Leave Act FMLA runs concurrently with Enrons Sick Leave policy An employee who is still disabled after using the hours of sick leave pay ends may qualify for long term disability insurance Sick days cannot be carried over from one calendar year to the next and employees are not paid for sick days either at the end of the calendar year or upon termination Proposed Policy Link Procedures To be eligible for sick leave pay employees unable to report to work must telephone their supervisor directly each day of their absence as far in advance as possible If their supervisor is not available the employees human resources representative should be contacted If an employee is unable to make the call personally a family member or a friend should contact the supervisor The supervisor or human resources representative must be contacted each day of absence An employee who fails to contact hisher immediate supervisor or human resources representative may forfeit the sick leave pay and may be considered as having voluntarily resigned This policy must be followed unless an exception has been made for a particular absence and a written memo to this effect has been sent to the employees human resources representative On the fifth day of continued absence due to injury or illness in addition to notifying the employees supervisor or human resources representative the employee must also attain a doctors certification indicating the estimated date in which the employee will be able to return to work Any absences exceeding weeks will require a doctors certification indicating that the employee is able to return to work

FWThis guy has called multiple people over and over again today with the below question We have communicated to him that the noncompetes are still valid at this time and he would be contacted when and if that changes Any further word on this Thanks Sarah Original Message From juan hernandez mailto Sent Monday December PM To Zarkowsky Sarah Subject Sarah could you respond on the status of my day noncompete clause With the unforeseen changes to Enrons business and the subsequent firing of employees under employment contracts I would assume that the day noncompete is no longer valid At a minimum could you please call me at or respond via email Thanks Juan Hernandez Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online

FW FMLAAttached is both the sick leave policy and link as well as the FMLA policy I believe Anne Labbe sent these policies to one or both of you while I was on vacation The deadline for approval on these polices has passed Please let me know of any changes that you wished made as soon as possible Thanks Sarah Original Message From Palmer Lizzette Sent Monday November PM To Zarkowsky Sarah Cc Cash Michelle Subject RE FMLA I think it best that Michelle and I see what you have drafted and provide comments to that Lizzette Original Message From Zarkowsky Sarah Sent Monday November PM To Palmer Lizzette Subject FW FMLA Importance High Have you had a chance to give this some thought if you want any must do language to be put in the policies directed exclusively to HR please let me know as soon as possible Original Message From Zarkowsky Sarah Sent Monday November AM To Palmer Lizzette Subject FMLA Lizzette The plan is that effective Jan FMLA and Enrons sick leave will run concurrently We are also going to have tier information meaning that HR people will view more policy information than the basic employee will Do you have any suggestions on what should be included in the tier information for HR regarding FMLA and or sick leave At the very least I think we should make it clear that HR is responsible for sending the FMLA notice letter out to employees when they are out sick and HR believes that the illness may fall under FMLA What are your thoughts Thanks Sarah

RE Pay for Christina Curtis TemporaryIm checking in to it Can you fax me a copy of the invoice Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Friday December AM To Zarkowsky Sarah Subject Pay for Christina Curtis Temporary I received an invoice from Corestaff for the day that Christina worked Do I need to do something with the invoice or will she be paid automatically

Update CorestaffMark I have forwarded the invoice to the appropriate person who is handling the prepost bankruptcy payments I have not heard back from him yet He may have or will contact you directly Thanks Sarah

FW Follow UpFYI Original Message From Smith Ron L Sent Thursday December PM To Zarkowsky Sarah Subject RE Follow Up Invoices should be processed as normal I have given the invoice to CSS our outsource service provider for contract labor This invoice should be processed through CSS Note Enron is not allowed to issue checks for prepetition invoices Thanks Ron Original Message From Zarkowsky Sarah Sent Thursday December PM To Smith Ron L Subject Follow Up Just wanted to follow up on the Corestaff Invoice I faxed over to you on the th What is the procedure now for such payments

RE Follow UpYes since Corestaff is who she would have gotten the pay check from she should definately contact them Let me know what they tell her Thanks Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Friday December AM To Zarkowsky Sarah Subject RE Follow Up Christina has not been paid yet Should I have her contact Corestaff Original Message From Zarkowsky Sarah Sent Fri AM To Whitt Mark Cc Subject FW Follow Up FYI Original Message From Smith Ron L Sent Thursday December PM To Zarkowsky Sarah Subject RE Follow Up Invoices should be processed as normal I have given the invoice to CSS our outsource service provider for contract labor This invoice should be processed through CSS Note Enron is not allowed to issue checks for prepetition invoices Thanks Ron Original Message From Zarkowsky Sarah Sent Thursday December PM To Smith Ron L Subject Follow Up Just wanted to follow up on the Corestaff Invoice I faxed over to you on the th What is the procedure now for such payments

RE Pay for Christina CurtisI am checking on itI dont see any reason why she wouldnt get paid through tomorrow but Im double checking on it Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Thursday November AM To Zarkowsky Sarah Subject Pay for Christina Curtis The temp that I hired started today and I would like to make sure she gets paid for today and tommorow She knows that is all she can expect Let me know if that is a problem
